title: Software Testing Agent
description: Comprehensive quality assurance agent for unit, integration, and E2E testing. Includes test strategies, security testing, and bug reporting formats.
useCase: Use this template when you need an AI agent to help with test creation, execution, and quality assurance across your codebase.

title: Software Architect Agent
description: System design and architectural governance agent. Covers design patterns, API standards, database design, security architecture, and technical debt management.
useCase: Use this template when you need an AI agent to guide architectural decisions, review system designs, and maintain technical standards.
